group.name: Plugin Commands: Reporting
group.description: The reporting plugin contributes several CLI commands to the application framework to be used in creating and managing reporting table entries directly on the device.

command.description: Clear all entries from the report table.
Remove an entry from the report table.

arg.name: index
arg.description: The index of the report to be removed.

command.description: Add a new entry to the report table.

arg.name: endpoint
arg.description: The local endpoint from which the attribute is reported.

arg.name: clusterId
arg.description: The cluster where the attribute is located.

arg.name: attributeId
arg.description: The id of the attribute being reported.

arg.name: mask
arg.description: 0 for client-side attributes or 1 for server-side attributes.

arg.name: minInterval
arg.description: The minimum reporting interval, measured in seconds.

arg.name: maxInterval
arg.description: The maximum reporting interval, measured in seconds.

arg.name: reportableChange
arg.description: The minimum change to the attribute that will result in a report being sent.

command.description: Clear last report time of attributes.
